scripts.build: rimraf dst && npm run build-core && npm run build-projections
scripts.build-core: microbundle src/index.js -o dst/index.js -f modern,es,cjs --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment
scripts.build-projections: microbundle src/projections/index.js -o dst/projections.js -f modern,es,cjs --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment
scripts.watch: microbundle watch src/index.js -o dst/index.js --no-compress -f modern,es,cjs --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment
